text: Arm in Arm Down the Street () is a 1966 Argentine Spanish comedy-drama movie directed by Enrique Carreras and was based on the play by Armando Mook. It stars Rodolfo Beb√°n, Evangelina Salazar, Susanna Campos, Enzo Viena, Lilian Valmar. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 comedy-drama movies Category:Argentine comedy movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Enrique Carreras
title: Arm in Arm Down the Street (1966 movie)
